The game has the worst community i ve ever seen.Its worse than league of legends that has way much bigger playerbase and is well known for its toxicity.People that actually know how to play the game are less than 1%.Ranking system is garbage and completely pointless since irrelevant players can easily reach high ranks.Killers will camp-tunnel you in more than 60% of your games while survivors will suicide on first hook if they get chased and hooked within the first few minutes which will cost you the game eventually.Both sides are toxic,and people wont let you play the game not even mention letting you enjoy it.It needs a lot of changes to become a consistent game.Unfortunately people ruin good ideas with their shity behavior.

If you're looking for a super structurally sound game, this game is not for you. It's buggy, and the dedicated servers make some interactions seem strange, to put it lightly. The game is frustrating, and at least 3 times a week I end up against builds that make me want to pry my tooth out. The community is anywhere between unaware largely and absolutely toxic. Teabagging and camping on a hook is to be expected, as are Moris and the incessant clicking of a flashlight. The game will test your very temper, making even the most iron spirit morph their manner into a muted yet bitter sarcasm. You will hate, until all you can do is laugh.

Love it, became my most played game in a month. Highly recommend to anybody. Honestly the most fun I've had with a competitive game ever.
bit toxic sometimes but fun regardless, a real wholesome family-friendly experience

Игра классная,но когда ты доходишь до 10 ранга убийцей то тебя начинаю насиловать выжившие. Кемпить и тунелить не запрещено так что вперед и за победой. Также хочется отметить довольно интересную атмосферу и не плохую графику. Каждый раз как ты проигрываешь за убийцу ты больше не хочешь играть но потом ты понимаешь что можешь лучше и продолжаешь играть и убивать выживших,становясь лучше и сильнее.360 за выжившего на высоком ранге бесполезны а вот на маленьких рангах вполне неплохо помогают закрутить убийцу.

This game sucks, and the devs suck. Just uninstalled. Don't bother getting invested in the game, community, or streams; It will literally always let you down.

Playing survivor isn't fun because of broken hitboxes, bugs/exploits, broken mechanics and shit developers.

Playing killer isn't fun because its so fucking stressful to babysit all these fucking idiots, and if they are actually playing smart, you LITERALLY cannot beat them. A "Pro" survivor team will stomp a "Pro" killer 9/10 times. You just don't have enough hands to hold all these survivors. (Just played a game. Nurse. 2 blink downs most every time. almost always in chase, not one dull moment. 3/4 survivors escaped)

Just don't bother investing time into this game. The only thing the devs care about is their quarterly bottom line. Another shit company who just cares about squeezing the money out of your pockets.

And fuck all the Community Managers that told us "We're not going to fix the game, We spent months of work to make these changes."
